name: Wolfenstein 3D: Spear of Destiny

execute.args: -c "cd $GAMEDIR && for f in `find`; do mv -v $f `echo $f | tr '[A-Z]' '[a-z]'`; done"

content:
exe: spear
files:
- wolf4sdl: https://lutris.net/files/games/wolfenstein-3d/wolf4sdl-spear-1.7-x86_64.tar.gz
- gamedata: $STEAM:9000:base
installer:
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: gamedata
- execute:
    args: -c "cd $GAMEDIR && for f in `find`; do mv -v $f `echo $f | tr '[A-Z]' '[a-z]'`;
      done"
    file: /bin/bash
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    file: wolf4sdl
